title: 820-3662-a
message: Hello there, I`m kind of new on repairing motherboards..so I`m gonna ask you to go easy on me please.  Basicaly this board has no liquid damage ..or anything like that..it just died on customer..there`s no green light but i do observed this : d7005 or near it gets worm..not hot ..it gets worm ..so if you can help please. Thank you . Hello louis..i`m watching all you videos...when i have time. Thank you and sorry if i`m gonna waste your time :).

title: 820-3662-a
message: Measure resistance to GND on PP3V42 rail.

title: 820-3662-a
message: i hope i`m doing this corectly ..so  on the c7008 pin 1 is 0.6 ohms.

title: 820-3662-a
message: So yeah there is a short on the 3V42 bus. Inject voltage on pin 2 of L7095 and see what heats up. Start with 1V and go up if nothing heats. Don't go above 3.5V of course.

title: 820-3662-a
message:
No Title

Sorry for the late answear. So i`ve done this , and it get a little bit hot ..near the cirus chip. on my board view, i don`t have this.:) there are 2 caps there...just near the heaphone jack.  i`ll upload a photo.  I`ll buy soon all the board and schematics.

title: 820-3662-a
message: One of the 2 will be shorted, replace them.

title: 820-3662-a
message: i`ve replace them and still nothing...but i`m gonna make that as a no fix.  Can i ask you here about another board or i need to make another post?

title: 820-3662-a
message: New post if it is a different board.
